comments.body:
It looks like there is a python entry point. Please include it:

https://conda.io/docs/user-guide/tasks/build-packages/define-metadata.html#python-entry-points

and add tests for the CLI:

https://conda.io/docs/user-guide/tasks/build-packages/define-metadata.html#test-commands

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@  number: 0
  skip: true  # [not linux]
  script: python -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed .
  entry_points:
    - import-timeseries = ixmp.cli:import_timeseries
